children.name: Can View Actions on Dashboard
children.description: Allows users to view actions on the dashboard.

children.name: Can View Items on Dashboard
children.description: Allows users to view items on the dashboard.

children.name: Can Close out Items on Dashboard
children.description: Allows users to close out resolved items on the dashboard.

children.name: Can View Findings on Actions
children.description: Allows users to view associated findings from the actions page.

children.name: Can Add Findings to Items from Actions
children.description: Allows users to add findings to an item associated with an action. PermissionTypes.FullAccess only as findings cannot be assigned.

children.name: Can View Dashboards
children.description: Allows users to view dashboards in the reporting section.

children.name: Can Create Dashboards
children.description: Allows users to create dashboards and add widgets in the reporting section.

children.name: Can Update Dashboards
children.description: Allows users to update dashboard details, add or remove widgets in the reporting section.

children.name: Can Delete Dashboards
children.description: Allows users to delete dashboards with associated widgets in the reporting section.

children.name: Can View Queries
children.description: Allows users to view queries in the reporting section. Queries are predefined or custom search operations.

children.name: Can Create Queries
children.description: Allows users to create new queries in the reporting section.

children.name: Can Update Queries
children.description: Allows users to edit or update existing queries in the reporting section.

children.name: Can Delete Queries
children.description: Allows users to delete queries in the reporting section.
